meanings.definition: A form of government in which all rule equally.
meanings.sent1: In the pantisocracies, every citizen has the same amount of power.
meanings.sent2: The idea of pantisocracies promotes equality among all individuals.
meanings.sent3: The pantisocracies in the story made everyone a leader, causing chaos.
meanings.sent4: The pantisocracies of the ants in the colony amazed the observers.
meanings.sent5: The dream of pantisocracies lingered in their minds, inspiring change.

meanings.definition: The concept of a utopian society where all members have equal power and influence.
meanings.sent1: They discussed the pantisocracies as a perfect world of equality.
meanings.sent2: The pantisocracies they envisioned had no hierarchy or discrimination.
meanings.sent3: In their pantisocracies, even the animals lived harmoniously together.
meanings.sent4: Her pantisocracies were like a colorful painting of unity and peace.
meanings.sent5: The idea of pantisocracies filled their hearts with hope for a better future.
